meta.name: Window of Tolerance Resourcing
meta.description: Detect nervous system state and offer regulation resources.

procedure.title: Detect State
procedure.instruction: Identify if they're in sympathetic (anxious/activated), dorsal (numb/shutdown), or window (regulated).

procedure.title: Offer Resource
procedure.instruction: Provide one nervous-system-appropriate regulation resource (grounding for sympathetic, gentle activation for dorsal, sustaining for window).

procedure.title: Check-In
procedure.instruction: Invite them to notice any shift and ask one question about what they need next.
